About

I’m Anik Das, a BSc Data Science graduate with a strong foundation in statistics, machine learning, data analytics, and data visualization. I enjoy turning data into actionable insights and building AI-powered tools with LLMs.

Skilled in Python, SQL, and libraries like Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, and Matplotlib. I’ve completed certifications from Microsoft, Meta, and Coursera in Python programming, data analysis, and AI fundamentals. I’m looking for roles as a data analyst or junior data scientist where I can contribute to data-driven decisions and scalable AI solutions.
